Text: lol chumly got it wrong again.. far sighted means seeing things far away not near.. thats near sighted LOL

I think discovery needs to put correction subs at the bottom when he talks
so called facts when they are wrong as hes going to confuse
the kids that watch it
i wish they would quit with these sitcom moments that they crowbar into every show.
I do love this show, we are way behind in Aussie.
